name: Mervin and the Wicked Station
description: Two astronauts find a mysterious space station during their exploratory mission. They decide to check if there are anybody who needs their help. But not only the station wasn't abandoned, it turned out that it's them who needs help. In fact, yours!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
